Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.body

Interface BodyInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChangeNotifierInterface, java.lang.Comparable<BodyInterface>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BodySphere, BodyXyLayer
    public interface BodyInterface
extends java.lang.Comparable<BodyInterface>, ChangeNotifierInterface
    Interface for bodies
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Method Detail

      • isInVolume

        boolean isInVolume​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace aPoint)
        Returns if a point in space is inside a body
        Parameters:
        aPoint - Point which is tested
        Returns:
        True if point is inside body, false if point is on surface or outside of body

        boolean isOverlap​(BodyInterface aBody)
        Returns if a body overlaps with this instance
        Parameters:
        aBody - aBody
        Returns:
        True: Body overlaps with this instance, false: Otherwise

      • fillRandomPointsInVolume

        void fillRandomPointsInVolume​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer,
                              int aFirstIndex,
                              int aNumber,
                              java.util.Random aRandomNumberGenerator)
        Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffer.
        Parameters:
        aBuffer - Buffer
        aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
        aNumber - Number of random points (not allowed to be less than 1)
        aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

      • fillRandomPointsInVolume

        void fillRandomPointsInVolume​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer1,
                              de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer2,
                              int aFirstIndex,
                              int aNumber,
                              java.util.Random aRandomNumberGenerator)
        Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffers.
        Parameters:
        aBuffer1 - Buffer 1
        aBuffer2 - Buffer 2
        aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
        aNumber - Number of random points for both buffers (not allowed to be less than 1)
        aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

      • fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres

        void fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer,
                                                  int aFirstIndex,
                                                  int aNumber,
                                                  int aNumberOfTrials,
                                                  java.util.Random aRandomNumberGenerator)
        Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffer. NOTE: The volume of spheres within the xy-layer is excluded for the random points in aBuffer. NOTE: If number of trials is NOT sufficient random points may be located within the excluded volume of the spheres.
        Parameters:
        aBuffer - Buffer
        aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
        aNumber - Number of random points for both buffers (not allowed to be less than 1)
        aNumberOfTrials - Number of trials for random point generation
        aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

      • fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres

        void fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer1,
                                                  de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer2,
                                                  int aFirstIndex,
                                                  int aNumber,
                                                  double aStepDistance,
                                                  int aNumberOfTrials,
                                                  java.util.Random aRandomNumberGenerator)
        Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffers. NOTE: The volume of spheres within the xy-layer is excluded NOT just for the random points in aBuffer1 and aBuffer2 but for all points along the straight line between aBuffer1[i] and aBuffer2[i] with the specified step distance. NOTE: If number of trials is NOT sufficient random points may be located within the excluded volume of the spheres.
        Parameters:
        aBuffer1 - Buffer 1
        aBuffer2 - Buffer 2
        aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
        aNumber - Number of random points for both buffers (not allowed to be less than 1)
        aStepDistance - Step distance for points along the straight lines between aBuffer1[i] and aBuffer2[i]
        aNumberOfTrials - Number of trials for random point generation
        aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

      • fillRandomPointsOnSurface

        void fillRandomPointsOnSurface​(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer,
                               int aFirstIndex,
                               int aNumber,
                               java.util.Random aRandomNumberGenerator)
        Fills aNumber random points on the surface of the body into buffer
        Parameters:
        aBuffer - Buffer
        aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
        aNumber - Number of random points (not allowed to be less than 1)
        aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal
